articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's Diverse Cabinet Picks: Breaking New Ground in Representation
articles.description: Donald Trump, the Republican President-elect, reveals historic cabinet appointments, featuring landmark diversity strides despite fewer women and people of color compared to President Biden's cabinet. Notable picks include the first woman chief of staff, first Hispanic Secretary of State, and first openly gay Republican in the Senate-confirmed cabinet role.
